extension.summary: Platform to browse and consume Pakistani media across devices
extension.description: -Browse TV channels, TV shows, movies, actors, fashion, photography, sports, YouTube channels from Pakistan -Browse musicians' albums, songs, Facebook albums, news and YouTube channels -Allows users to play video, music or image content individually or in "play all in list" mode -Allows users to pull any YouTube users playlists, uploaded/favorite videos and playing in "play all in list" mode -More info available at http://code.google.com/p/pakee
